summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Resume ATS Score Checker application. Backend APIs are functional with OpenAI GPT-5.2 integration working. Frontend UI loads correctly with thermal brutalist design and proper navigation. File upload validation works correctly.

minor_issues.issue: Analysis retrieval by ID returns 404 even for valid IDs from history
minor_issues.impact: Users cannot retrieve specific analysis results

passed_tests: Landing page loads with thermal brutalist design
Navigation from landing to analysis page works
File upload area displays correctly with drag-drop interface
Form validation - analyze button disabled without required inputs
File type validation rejects non-PDF/DOC files
Thermal design elements (dark theme, red accents, Azeret Mono font) implemented correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix the /api/analysis/{id} endpoint to properly retrieve analysis results by ID. The endpoint returns 404 even for valid analysis IDs that exist in the history.
